contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=April 2012}} {{one source|date=April 2012}} [[X Games]] XII (12) took place on August 3-6, 2006 in Los Angeles, California at the [[Staples Center]], [[Home Depot Center]] and [[Long Beach Marine Stadium]]. It was broadcast on the [[ESPN]] networks and [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]] ==Results== ===Moto X Freestyle=== {|class="wikitable" |- !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Travis Pastrana]] |94.20 |- |Silver | [[Adam Jones (motocross rider)|Adam Jones]] |91.40 |- |Bronze |[[Mike Mason (motocross rider)|Mike Mason]] |90.00 |} ===Moto X Step-up=== {|class="wikitable" |- !width="50"|Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" |Elimination Height |- |Gold |[[Matt Buyten]] | |- |Silver |[[Jeremy McGrath]] |23’ |- |Bronze |[[Brian Deegan (rider)|Brian Deegan]] |23’ |} ===Moto X Super Moto=== {|class="wikitable" |- !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Driver !width="125" | Seconds Behind |- |Gold |[[Jeff_Ward_%28motocross%29|Jeff Ward]] | |- |Silver |[[Mark Burkhart]] |0.572 secs |- |Bronze |[[Doug Henry (motocross)|Doug Henry]] |24.161 secs |} ===Rally Super Special=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Drivers !width="125" | Seconds Behind |- |rowspan="2" | Gold | [[Travis Pastrana]] |rowspan="2" | |- |[[Christian Edström]] |- |rowspan="2" | Silver | [[Colin McRae]] |rowspan="2" | 0.52 secs |- |[[Nicky Grist]] |- |rowspan="2" | Bronze |[[Ken Block (rally driver)|Ken Block]] |rowspan="2" |19.13 secs |- |[[Alex Gelsomino]] |} === BMX Big Air === {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Kevin Robinson (BMX rider)|Kevin Robinson]] |95.00 |- |Silver |[[Chad Kagy]] |93.66 |- |Bronze | [[Allan Cooke]] |86.00 |} ===BMX Dirt=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Corey Bohan]] |91.66 |- |Silver |[[Ryan Nyquist]] |91.33 |- |Bronze |[[Anthony Napolitan]] |90.33 |} ===BMX Freestyle Park=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Scotty Cranmer]] |91.66 |- |Silver |[[Morgan Wade]] |90.00 |- |Bronze | [[Daniel Dhers]] |89.66 |} ===BMX Vert=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Chad Kagy]] |93.00 |- |Silver |[[Jamie Bestwick]] |91.66 |- |Bronze |[[Simon Tabron]] |90.00 |} ===BMX Vert Best Trick=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Trick |- |Gold |[[Kevin Robinson (BMX rider)|Kevin Robinson]] |[[Double Flair]] |- |Silver | [[Chad Kagy]] |Double [[tailwhip]] flat spin |- |Bronze |[[Simon Tabron]] |Alley oop n/h to t/d 540 |} === Men's Skateboard - Vert === {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete |- |Gold |[[Sandro Dias]] |- |Silver |[[Bob Burnquist]] |- |Bronze |[[Bucky Lasek]] |} ===Men's Skateboard Vert Best Trick=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Trick |- |Gold |[[Bucky Lasek]] |Frontside cab varial heel flip |- |Silver |[[Max Dufour]] |Backside kickflip 360 tail grind |- |Bronze |[[Bob Burnquist]] |Fronside tail slide 360 out |} ===Men's Skateboard Big Air=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Danny Way]] |95.00 |- |Silver | [[Jake Brown (skateboarder)|Jake Brown]] |93.00 |- |Bronze |[[Bob Burnquist]] |91.25 |} ===Men's Skateboard Street=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete !width="125" | Score |- |Gold |[[Chris_Cole_%28skateboarder%29|Chris Cole]] |90.68 |- |Silver |[[Ryan Sheckler]] |85.31 |- |Bronze |[[Andrew Reynolds (skateboarder)|Andrew Reynolds]] |85.06 |} ===Women's Skateboard Street=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete |- |Gold |[[Elissa Steamer]] |- |Silver |[[Lauren Perkins]] |- |Bronze |[[Lacey Baker]] |} ===Women's Skateboarding Vert=== {| class="wikitable" !width="50"| Place !width="200"|Athlete |- |Gold |[[Cara-Beth Burnside]] |- |Silver |[[Mimi Knoop]] |- |Bronze |[[Karen Jones]] |} ==Other Highlights Worth Noting== *Shaun White failed to land the 1080 in skate best trick after 17 contest attempts, and 2 past event, injuring his hand on the second post-contest attempt. *Colin McRae was leading at the 4th split when at the jump he flipped the car after landing. McRae still managed to finish 2nd in the Rally event. == References == [http://expn.go.com/expn/feature?name=sx12results X Games XII Website at EXPN.com] {{X Games}} [[Category:X Games in Los Angeles, California]] [[Category:2006 in American sports]] [[Category:2006 in rallying]] [[Category:2006 in multi-sport events]]
